item.title: [BHS4/BHS5/BHS6/BHS7][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 15, 13:00 - 17:00 UTC

Dec 5, 10:31 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Dec 3, 19:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 15/01/2025 13:00 UTC
End time : 15/01/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a downtime of up to 20 minutes for each intervention.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work.
We have carefully planned and scheduled the interventions to minimize any potential impact on your services.

The maintenance schedule is as follows:
BHS4 : Start of intervention at 13:00 UTC

  • (Rooms at risk : T04A, T04B and T04C )

BHS5 : Start of intervention at 13:45 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T05A, T05B, T05C, T05D, T05E, T05F, T05G and T05H)

BHS6 : Start of intervention at 15:00 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G)

BHS7(first part) : Start of intervention at 15:45 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : B702, B703, B707 and B709)

BHS7(second part) : Start of intervention at 16:30 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : B710 and B716)


Thank you for your understanding.
